statements: SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT name, dob FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_id, name FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM PatientRecords WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT name, dob FROM PatientRecords WHERE dob > '2000-01-01' ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM PatientRecords WHERE dob < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address, insurance_provider FROM patients;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, quantity FROM prescriptions WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id;

SELECT p.patient_id, p.patient_name, p.date_of_birth, p.address, pr.medication_name, pr.quantity, pr.prescription_date
FROM patients p
JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id
WHERE p.insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance'
ORDER BY p.date_of_birth DESC, pr.quantity ASC;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.address, pr.medication_name, pr.quantity
FROM prescriptions pr
JOIN patients p ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id
WHERE pr.quantity > 10
ORDER BY pr.quantity DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, p.address, pr.medication_name, pr.quantity, pr.prescription_date
FROM prescriptions pr
JOIN patients p ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id
WHERE p.date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01'
ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC, pr.prescription_date DESC;

SELECT pr.medication_name, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions
FROM prescriptions pr
GROUP BY pr.medication_name
ORDER BY total_prescriptions DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions
FROM patients p
JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id
GROUP BY p.patient_name
ORDER BY total_prescriptions DESC, p.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescription_data WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT patient_id, medication FROM prescription_data WHERE medication = 'Amoxicillin' ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patient_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross'
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, detection_reason FROM fraud_detection ORDER BY detection_date
SELECT * FROM prescription_data ORDER BY date_prescribed DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, medication FROM prescription_data WHERE dosage LIKE '10%'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'Medicare'
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection JOIN prescription_data ON fraud_detection.prescription_id = prescription_data.prescription_id;
SELECT MAX(date_prescribed) AS latest_prescription_date FROM prescription_data
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM Physicians WHERE hospital_name = 'General Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM FraudulentActivities ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, prescription_date FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM Physicians ORDER BY physician_name DESC;
SELECT activity_id, description FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, drug_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage = '2 pills';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, doctor_id, prescription_date, drug_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 35 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location LIKE '%CITY%'
